workspace.name: races-0.0.2
workspace.query:
-- USE entity-services-examples-content;
SELECT Race.name, Race.wonByRunner, Race.courseLength, Run.id, Run.distance, Run.duration, Run.runnerName, Run.runnerAge, Run.runnerGender FROM Race, Run JOIN Race_comprisedOfRuns AS r ON Race.name = r.name WHERE r.comprisedOfRuns = Run.id ORDER BY Run.duration
-- USE entity-services-examples-content; SELECT distance, count(*) FROM Race.Run GROUP by distance ORDER by distance DESC

xquery version "1.0-ml"; declare namespace html = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml";

hello world
